Bug Tracking
To improve bug tracking for terminatorX I've setup a bugzilla installation on this machine. You can access this bugzilla here.
So if you find a bug in terminatorX or have a feature request please use this system so the issue can be handled properly.
Of course you can also check whether your bug has been filed already.
Access
If you haven't used this bugzilla before you will have to get an account if you want to be able to file new bugs.
